channel.title: Help with NRS3/matrix willing to pay for second one
channel.description: Hi im wondering how to change the xp rates and make them higher for summoning and combat on NRS3 server? please help with detail im a big noob! sorry :( Also the serv sometimes nulls out when people pk if i get a fix for this i can pay 1m on rs :D HOW do i make 99 magic a default when u start the serv?

item.title: Help with NRS3/matrix willing to pay for second one

item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

ty for the xp rate can any1 else help me with other stuff? or help me make 99 magic default

Read full topic
